short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension with quick view badge for currency conversion(s). Open source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Currency converter with a simple UI and minimal configuration. Shows default currency rate as badge in the extension icon. Light weight. Open sourced.
